Entries.default: "The weak have been culled! The strong endure!"
"A new challenger joins our eternal hunt."
"Even a weak hunter can be coddled by luck."
"Our challenger returns for the third trial of the Rite of Passage."
"We honor those extinguished in this arena and welcome their souls into our greater glory."
"We await the next challenger."
"You have completed the first examination. Well done."
"Your fury brings joy to this arena! And honor to your name!"
"You have endured but the first of many trials. Return when you are ready to face your next challenge."
"Though our challenger has faced more dangerous foes, few have remained as terrifying in death."
"Our newest crop gathers for the culling."
"Glorious combat reveals our contender from amongst the challengers!"
"Rest and return anew, for the crowd is eager to see you hunt again, contender."
"As is tradition, the primal elements shall sort predator from prey!"
"Triumph or perish. There is neither surrender nor retreat."
"Their task is simple! Slay! Or be slain!"
"Those who survive earn the right to contend for the champion's crown. Let the hunt commence!"
"Now, our challenger must face the archipelago's most insidious hunters - the nƒÅga!"
"If you can endure venom and vile cunning, then perhaps you have the makings of a proper contender."
"The Watcher gave Maerwald some measure of mercy in the past. Perhaps this recollection will show similar reluctance to harm the Watcher?"
"The Watcher bound Maerwald's soul to Caed Nua for all time! This spirit, long burning for vengeance, will now have its moment!"
"The Watcher chose to consume Maerwald, leaving the very angry memory of a very aggrieved Maerwald!"
"Now show us your will to fight!"
"This battle is drawn from the challenger's past - the slaying of Maerwald the Mad, sentinel of Caed Nua."
"For Maerwald's madness is an all but inevitable fate for our challenger, as well. The old wizard was a portent of things to come."
"The weight of your past does not cage you. Not in the heat of battle, at least."
"It seems the clever serpents posed no threat to you."
"One must approach every foe with a clear mind, unbound by what was and what could have been!"
"Regret grows heavier the longer one carries it. Harvest what you need from it and discard the rest."
"Further trials await you, challenger. Steel yourself!"
"The hunt is not merely the rush of battle, but preparedness and patience before."
"Now witness as the Watcher contends with an unparalleled foe - his beginning and his end!"
Entries.female: "Now witness as the Watcher contends with an unparalleled foe - her beginning and her end!"
